description: A template in the Cases domain. This template is used to define the case object model (that is, to define what data can be captured on cases) in a Cases domain. A template must have a unique name within a domain, and it must reference existing field IDs and layout IDs.

LayoutConfiguration.description: Specifies the default layout to use when displaying cases created from this template. The layout determines which fields are visible and their arrangement in the agent interface.

DefaultLayout.description: The unique identifier of a layout.
DefaultLayout.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of a layout.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 500  
Update requires: No interruption

LayoutConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Specifies the default layout to use when displaying cases created from this template. The layout determines which fields are visible and their arrangement in the agent interface.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

RequiredField.description: Wrapper object containing a field identifier

FieldId.description: The unique identifier of a field.
FieldId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of a field.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 500  
Update requires: No interruption

RequiredField.markdownDescription:
Wrapper object containing a field identifier

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TemplateRule.description: Links a case rule to a specific field within this template. When specified, the rule's conditions will be evaluated for the associated field, controlling behavior like required status, visibility, or available options.

CaseRuleId.description: The unique identifier of a case rule.
CaseRuleId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of a case rule.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 500  
Update requires: No interruption

FieldId.description: The ID of the field that this rule applies to.
FieldId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the field that this rule applies to.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 500  
Update requires: No interruption

TemplateRule.markdownDescription:
Links a case rule to a specific field within this template. When specified, the rule's conditions will be evaluated for the associated field, controlling behavior like required status, visibility, or available options.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TemplateStatus.description: The current status of the template. Active templates can be used to create new cases, while Inactive templates are disabled but preserved for existing cases.
TemplateStatus.markdownDescription:
The current status of the template. Active templates can be used to create new cases, while Inactive templates are disabled but preserved for existing cases.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Active | Inactive  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainId.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.
DomainId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 500  
Update requires: Replacement

Maximum Length: 100

Description.description: A description explaining the purpose and use case for this template. Should indicate what types of cases this template is designed for and any specific workflow it supports.
